    Methods in controller that return POSITION_RESULT
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    POSITION_RESULT[][]
    BattleshipController.getPlayerAnswerGrid()
    Returns a grid that contains the locations of all the attacks the current player had made to the opposing player's grid.
    Methods in controller with parameters of type POSITION_RESULT
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    BattleshipController.updateOpponentGrid(POSITION_RESULT[][] updatedGrid, boolean gameEnded)
    This method takes in an updated grid from the opposing player that resulted from the current player's move and updates its current information of the opponent's grid.

    private void

    This private helper method updates the current player's grid based on any changes made in the model.
